starters.title: Summer Veggie Soup
instructions: Chop the veggies to smaller chunks.
Fry the onion and carrot slices in the oil, until golden.
Add the paprika powder and quickli fill up the pot with cold water.
Add the rest of the ingredients.
Cook the soup about 20 minutes or until the veggies are soft.
Serve each plate of soup with a tbs of sour cream

starters.title: Stuffed eggs
instructions: Boil the eggs until pefectly hard.
Finely chop the ham, the pickle and the parsley
Mix the mayo, sour cream and pickle and pour them on the bottom your serving plate. This is going to be the bed of the eggs
Cut the eggs into two and remove the egg yalks into a bowl
Smash the yalks with a fork and mix them with the mustard, paste, salt, pepper and ham.
Fill the egg whites with the yalks, and place them on the top of the souce.
decorate with chopped parsley and let it cool perfectly
